name: Fiber Emlem: Twelve Tikis
description:
Trouble is afoot, and it's up to Popular Character Tiki and her 11 alts* to save the day! Play through at least 4 maps with 12 different playable characters (4 per map, until the ending)! 

Features:

  • Strategy RPG with 12 Playable characters, each with a unique gimmick or two.
  • 12 collectible items to find!
  • Weird unit types (Flying healer? Armored mage?)
  • 2 optional unlockable characters?
  • Plant Watermelons, bribe enemies with ice cream, go trick-or-treating.
  • Enemies that make use of chokepoints
  • Several Quality of Life features added (eg. Targeting Lines a la Three Houses)
  • At least 4 maps! (~3-5 hours of gameplay)
  • 3 endings!

FAQ:

Hey, ______ isn't Tiki!

Are they a green-haired dragon lady who wears primarily pink and red? Then close enough! (Naga is related it's fine. Probably.)

Does this make Nowi Tiki's daughter?

As far as this game's canon is concerned, Nowi doesn't exist, because the idea of her marrying somebody and having a kid while looking and acting childlike is super creepy.

Can I write about this game on [gaming news website]?

Please don’t. I don’t need to get C&D’d for this.

How to support this game?

This game is finished! However, here are some things you can do if you're feeling generous:

  • Support the artists who worked on this game.
  • Support the coders who made the (free!) plugins that this game uses.
  • Buy my future games?
  • Leave a comment, rating, or review! It would make me really happy to see people enjoying this dumb thing I made!

Disclaimer

This is a not-for-profit parody fangame, and is not in any way endorsed by or associated with Nintendo, Intelligent Systems, or Fire Emblem. Please support the official games!
